StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetHighSchoolPlanTypes]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS BEGIN
SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT DISTINCT PLAN_TYPE AS PLAN_TYPE, SHORT_DESCRIPTION, CONVERT(CHAR(11), GETDATE(), 106) AS PLANNED_MONTH, CONVERT(CHAR(11), GETDATE(), 106) AS ACTUAL_MONTH FROM HIGH_SCHOOL_PLAN_TYPE WITH (NOLOCK) END
